properties.title: Early Bumblebee
properties.description: Osgoldcross Photography posted a photo: The early bumblebee, Bombus pratorum, is a black bumblebee, with a yellow band around the front of the thorax and red colouration on abdominal segments 4 to 6. The queen is 15 to 17mm, the worker 9 to 14mm and the male 11 to 13mm. It is called "early" because at rarley seen after July and starts activity in April.
